## useAsync variable

React hook to subscribe to an observable and to automatically unsubscribe via an effect.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useAsync: <T>(aIn: ObservableInput<T>, aInitialState?: T | Generator<T>) => T | undefined
```
